datatype.description: Avian Count Sample-history Data -- Date, time, weather conditions, observer identification number related to avian data collected along survey route (stops 1-50)

file.name: Weather.zip
file.description: Compressed version of data file (Weather.csv) containing sample history of routes; date sampled, who sampled (observer ID), weather conditions, time.

field.name: RouteDataID
field.description: Data identification number; unique for each unique combination of countrynum region, route, RPID, and year.

field.name: countrynum
field.description: The three digit identification code for country. See RegionCodes.txt file for key. (Leading zeros may not appear in spreadsheet)

field.name: statenum
field.description: The two digit numerical code that identifies the state, province or territory where the route was run. See RegionCodes.txt file for key. (Leading zeros may not appear in spreadsheet)

field.name: Route
field.description: The three digit code that identifies the route - unique within states. (Leading zeros may not appear in spreadsheet)

field.name: RPID
field.description: Three digit run protocol identification number. See RunProtocolID.txt for key.

field.name: Year
field.description: The Year surveyed.

field.name: Month
field.description: The Month surveyed.

field.name: Day
field.description: The Day surveyed.

field.name: ObsN
field.description: Observer Number of Observer who conducted route.

field.name: TotalSpp
field.description: Total number of species seen during run.

field.name: StartTemp
field.description: Temperature at the start of the run.

field.name: EndTemp
field.description: Temperature at the end of the run.

field.name: TempScale
field.description: Temperate Scale (Celsius or Fahrenheit)

field.name: StartWind
field.description: Wind status at the start of the run. Beaufort Scale: see WeatherCodes.txt file.

field.name: EndWind
field.description: Wind status at the end of the run. Beaufort Scale: see WeatherCodes.txt file.

field.name: StartSky
field.description: Sky status at the start of the run. National Weather Service Code: see WeatherCodes.txt file.

field.name: EndSky
field.description: Sky status at the end of the run. National Weather Service Code: see WeatherCodes.txt file.

field.name: StartTime
field.description: Time the run was started.

field.name: EndTime
field.description: Time the run was ended.

field.name: Assistant
field.description: If someone assisted the observer by recording the data, then this column is 1, otherwise it is 0.

field.name: QualityCurrentID
field.description: Indicates whether the route sampling event (i.e., run) took place under suitable weather conditions and within suitable time, date, and route completion criteria. If data meet criteria, then QualityCurrentID is 1, otherwise it is 0. See RunType.txt.

field.name: RunType
field.description: The RunType code helps to quickly determine which data do, or do not meet the BBS program’s data criteria. A RunType code of 1 is assigned whenever data were collected under conditions that meet BBS weather, date, time, and route completion criteria (QualityCurrentID = 1) on a randomly established route (i.e., RouteTypeDetailID = 1) using the official BBS sampling protocol (RPID [RunProtocolID] = 101). Conversely, a RunType code of 0 indicates that data from a run fail to meet one or more of the aforementioned requirements. This could occur in one of 3 scenarios, or in combination, when: data exceed suitable date, time, weather, and/or route completion criteria QualityCurrentID = 0), data had been collected along a non-randomly established route (i.e., RouteTypeDetailID is not 1), and/or when the official BBS sampling protocol had not been used or it is a replicate run (RPID [RunProtocolID] is not 101). See RunType.txt for more information'

datatype.description: Route Location Data -- Route location information including latitude and longitude of start point

file.name: Routes.Zip
file.description: Compressed version of data file (Routes.csv) containing list of routes with Latitude, Longitude, Stratum, and whether it is currently active

field.name: countrynum
field.description: The three digit identification code for country. See RegionCodes.txt file for key. (Leading zeros may not appear in spreadsheet)

field.name: statenum
field.description: The two digit numerical code that identifies the state, province or territory where the route was run. See RegionCodes.txt file for key. (Leading zeros may not appear in spreadsheet)

field.name: Route
field.description: The three digit code that identifies the route - unique within states. (Leading zeros may not appear in spreadsheet)

field.name: RouteName
field.description: The name of the route.

field.name: Active
field.description: Flag that shows if the route is currently active, or has been discontinued.

field.name: Latitude
field.description: Latitude of the route start point.

field.name: Longitude
field.description: Longitude of the route start point.

field.name: Stratum
field.description: The BBS physiographic stratum code for that route. See BBSStrata.txt file for more information

field.name: BCR
field.description: The Bird Conservation Region where the route is located.

field.name: RouteTypeID
field.description: Indicates route substrate. 1 = Roadside, 2 = Water, 3 = Off-road

field.name: RouteTypeDetailID
field.description: Indicates route length and selection criteria (i.e., random vs. non-random). 1 = Random 50 Stops, 2 = Not Random 50 Stops, 3 = 3 Not Random < 50 stops

datatype.description: Summarized Avian Count Data -- Avian count data summarized by 10-stop intervals and summarized across all 50 stops. The Summarized Avian Count Data have been further subdivided into regional and species-groups files for ease of handling

files.description: Compressed version of data files ([RegionName].csv) containing avian count data 1966-2017 summarized at 10-stop and 50-stop intervals for all breeding species detected, where [RegionName] represents place holder for actual region name. Due to database size, data subdivided into regions (e.g., Alabama.zip, Njersey.zip, and NovaSco.zip). Regional data files found in "States" folder and list of regional file names found in "ReadMe.txt" file.

field.name: RouteDataID
field.description: Data identification number; unique for each unique combination of countrynum region, route, RPID, and year.

field.name: Countrynum
field.description: The three digit identification code for country. See RegionCodes.txt file for key.

field.name: Statenum
field.description: The two digit numerical code that identifies the state, province or territory where the route was run. See RegionCodes.txt file for key.

field.name: Route
field.description: The three digit code that identifies the route - unique within states.

field.name: RPID
field.description: Three digit run protocol identification number. See RunProtocolID.txt for key.

field.name: Year
field.description: The year surveyed. The Countrynum, StateNum, Route, RPID, and Year columns uniquely identify a run of a route.

field.name: AOU
field.description: The five digit species identification code.

field.name: Count10
field.description: Total individuals of the species recorded on stops 1-10.

field.name: Count20
field.description: Total individuals of the species recorded on stops 11-20.

field.name: Count30
field.description: Total individuals of the species recorded on stops 21-30.

field.name: Count40
field.description: Total individuals of the species recorded on stops 31-40.

field.name: Count50
field.description: Total individuals of the species recorded on stops 41-50.

field.name: StopTotal
field.description: Total number of stops out of 50 on which the species was recorded.

field.name: SpeciesTotal
field.description: Total individuals recorded on that run of the route (Sum from all stops.).

file.name: MigrantSummary.zip
file.description: Compressed version of data file (MigrantSummary.csv) containing incidental Migrant, Vagrant, Nonbreeding bird data in 10-stop summary format.

field.name: RouteDataID
field.description: Data identification number; unique for each unique combination of countrynum region, route, RPID, and year.

field.name: countrynum
field.description: The three digit identification code for country. See RegionCodes.txt file for key. (Leading zeros may not appear in spreadsheet)

field.name: statenum
field.description: The two digit numerical code that identifies the state, province or territory where the route was run. See RegionCodes.txt file for key. (Leading zeros may not appear in spreadsheet)

field.name: Route
field.description: The three digit code that identifies the route - unique within states. (Leading zeros may not appear in spreadsheet)

field.name: RPID
field.description: Also known as RunProtocolID. A three digit run protocol identification number. See RunProtocolID.txt for key.

field.name: Year
field.description: The Year surveyed.

field.name: AOU
field.description: 5 Digit species identification number. (Leading zeros may not appear in spreadsheet)

field.name: count10
field.description: Sum of the total individuals of the species recorded at stops 1-10.

field.name: count20
field.description: Sum of the total individuals of the species recorded at stops 11-20.

field.name: count30
field.description: Sum of the total individuals of the species recorded at stops 21-30.

field.name: count40
field.description: Sum of the total individuals of the species recorded at stops 31-40.

field.name: count50
field.description: Sum of the total individuals of the species recorded at stops 41-50.

field.name: StopTotal
field.description: Total number of stops that the species was recorded at.

field.name: SpeciesTotal
field.description: Total individuals of the species recorded across all 50 stops.

datatype.description: Avian Count Data by Individual Stops (1-50) -- avian count data at individual stop level within route (U.S.A: 1997 - 2014; Canada: 1997 - 2014, as well as earlier years for some provinces)

file.name: Fifty1.zip
file.description: Compressed version of data file (Fifty1.csv) containing part 1 of the fifty-stop data. Contains 1997 to present data for Alabama, Alaska, Alberta, Arizona, and Arkansas

file.name: Fifty2.zip
file.description: Compressed version of data file (Fifty2.csv) containing part 2 of the fifty-stop data. Contains 1997 to present data for British Columbia, California, Colorado, Connecticut, and Delaware

file.name: Fifty3.zip
file.description: Compressed version of data file (Fifty3.csv) containing part 3 of the fifty-stop data. Contains 1997 to present data for Florida, Georgia, Idaho, Illinois, Indiana, and Iowa

file.name: Fifty4.zip
file.description: Compressed version of data file (Fifty4.csv) containing part 4 of the fifty-stop data. Contains 1997 to present data for Kansas, Kentucky, Louisiana, Northwest Territories, Maine, Manitoba, Maryland, and Massachusetts

file.name: Fifty5.zip
file.description: Compressed version of data file (Fifty5.csv) containing part 5 of the fifty-stop data. Contains 1997 to present data for Michigan, Minnesota, Mississippi, Missouri, Montana, Nebraska, Nevada, New Brunswick and Newfoundland

file.name: Fifty6.zip
file.description: Compressed version of data file (Fifty6.csv) containing part 6 of the fifty-stop data. Contains 1997 to present data for New Hampshire, New Jersey, New Mexico, New York, and North Carolina

file.name: Fifty7.zip
file.description: Compressed version of data file (Fifty7.csv) containing part 7 of the fifty-stop data. Contains 1997 to present data for North Dakota, Nunavut, Nova Scotia, Ohio, Oklahoma, and Ontario

file.name: Fifty8.zip
file.description: Compressed version of data file (Fifty8.csv) containing part 8 of the fifty-stop data. Contains 1997 to present data for Oregon, Pennsylvania, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, Rhode Island, Saskatchewan, and South Carolina

file.name: Fifty9.zip
file.description: Compressed version of data file (Fifty9.csv) containing part 9 of the fifty-stop data. Contains 1997 to present data for South Dakota, Tennessee, Texas, Utah, and Vermont

file.name: Fifty10.zip
file.description: Compressed version of data file (Fifty10.csv) containing part 10 of the fifty-stop data. Contains 1997 to present data for Virginia, Washington, West Virginia, Wisconsin, Wyoming, and Yukon Territories

field.name: MigrantStatus
field.description: Migrant status of the species.

field.name: ID
field.description: ID number for each row. Not found in all files. Is retained as connection to contractor's initial data entry work but is not integral to data. Not found in the original BBS database.

field.name: State
field.description: Indicates the province or territory for the data. (Leading zeros may not appear in spreadsheet)

field.name: Route
field.description: Indicates the route number. (Leading zeros may not appear in spreadsheet)

field.name: Year
field.description: Year in which the data were collected.

field.name: Page
field.description: Represents a specific group of 10 stops.

field.name: AOU Number
field.description: Species number per old American Ornithologists' Union (AOU) system or BBS system. Note that the BBS database now uses a five digit number, but the 2-4 digit numbers found in these files will be the same as the right-most digits in the newer BBS numbers.

field.name: SpCode
field.description: Four-letter species alpha code, in most cases the same as the Bird Banding Laboratory banding codes. Not found in all files. Not integral to data. Not found in the original BBS database.

field.name: Species Name
field.description: English Common Name of species. Should follow American Ornithologists Union except for BBS exceptions.

field.name: Stop_1
field.description: Stop 1 in the 10 Stop Block (Stops 1, 11, 21, 31, 41)

field.name: Stop_2
field.description: Stop 2 in the 10 Stop Block (Stops 2, 12, 22, 32, 42)

field.name: Stop_3
field.description: Stop 3 in the 10 Stop Block (Stops 3, 13, 23, 33, 43)

field.name: Stop_4
field.description: Stop 4 in the 10 Stop Block (Stops 4, 14, 24, 34, 44)

field.name: Stop_5
field.description: Stop 5 in the 10 Stop Block (Stops 5, 15, 25, 35, 45)

field.name: Stop_6
field.description: Stop 6 in the 10 Stop Block (Stops 6, 16, 26, 36, 46)

field.name: Stop_7
field.description: Stop 7 in the 10 Stop Block (Stops 7, 17, 27, 37, 47)

field.name: Stop_8
field.description: Stop 8 in the 10 Stop Block (Stops 8, 18, 28, 38, 48)

field.name: Stop_9
field.description: Stop 9 in the 10 Stop Block (Stops 9, 19, 29, 39, 49)

field.name: Stop_0
field.description: Stop 10 in the 10 Stop Block (Stops 10, 20, 30, 40, 50)

field.name: New Total
field.description: Totals stop data entered during 50-stop data entry process, for visual comparison with the Old Total field. Formula.

field.name: Old Total
field.description: Total for this species/stop imported from the regular BBS database, for comparison and error detection.

field.name: Compare
field.description: Displays a flag for discrepancies between new total and old total. These should all be accompanied by a code in the "error code" column and a comment in the "Comments" column. In some files it is generated by formula. It is not integral to the data.

field.name: Error Code
field.description: Describes error type. See Table 2 in Documentation for BBS 50-stop data 1966-1996.pdf

field.name: Comment
field.description: Comments related to error, may advise re further action.

file.name: VehicleSummary.zip
file.description: Compressed version of data file (VehicleSummary.csv) containing vehicle count and excessive noise data in 10-stop summary format.

field.name: RouteDataID
field.description: Data identification number; unique for each unique combination of countrynum region, route, RPID, and year.

field.name: countrynum

field.name: Year
field.description: The Year surveyed.

field.name: CarsRecorded
field.description: Flag that indicates if car and/or noise data was recorded.

field.description: Sum of the total individuals of the species recorded at stops 1-10.

field.name: count20
field.description: Sum of the total individuals of the species recorded at stops 11-20.

field.name: count30
field.description: Sum of the total individuals of the species recorded at stops 21-30.

field.name: count40
field.description: Sum of the total individuals of the species recorded at stops 31-40.

field.name: count50
field.description: Sum of the total individuals of the species recorded at stops 41-50.

field.name: StopTotal
field.description: Total number of stops that the species was recorded at during the run.

field.name: Noise10
field.description: Number of stops were execessive noise was recorded at stops 1-10.

field.name: Noise20
field.description: Number of stops were execessive noise was recorded at stops 11-20.

field.name: Noise30

field.name: Noise50
field.description: Number of stops were execessive noise was recorded at stops 41-50.

field.name: NoiseTotal
field.description: Total number of stops were execessive noise was record during the run.
